long_description: The Anon Hawkeye Painted snow goggles have a low-profile frame and a large, spherical lens designed for a wide field of vision and versatility on days when the light is flat or cloudy. Silver Amber lens has an amber tint with 35% visible light transmission for good depth perception in low, flat to partly cloudy light; silver mirror cuts glare. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging, delivering clear vision in changing weather. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Low-profile and tough thermoplastic polyurethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures for a comfortable, secure fit. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible Anon Hawkeye Painted snow goggles are designed for medium-size faces and come with a microfiber storage bag.
short_description: The Anon Hawkeye Painted snow goggles have a low-profile frame and a large, spherical lens designed for a wide field of vision and versatility on days when the light is flat or cloudy.
